original_text: And when they came unto the borders of Jordan, that are in the land of Canaan, the children of Reuben and the children of Gad and the half tribe of Manasseh built there an altar by Jordan, a great altar to see to.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 므낫세 반 지파가 가나안 땅 요단 언덕 가에 이르자 거기서 요단 가에 제단을 쌓았는데 보기에 큰 제단이었더라

sentences.original_text: And when they came unto the borders of Jordan
that are in the land of Canaan
and the half tribe of Manasseh
built there an altar by Jordan
a great altar to see to
